content: needle 1 k to 3 sts before end of nee- row 2 ws sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn dle k2tog k1 row 3 rs sl1 k8 ssk k1 turn sts are now arranged as follows 26 sts needle 2 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end row 4 ws sl1 p9 p2tog p1 turn on needle 1 and on needle 3 33 sts on of needle k2tog k1 row 5 rs sl1 k10 ssk k1 turn needle 2 needle 3 k1 ssk k to end of needle row 6 ws sl1 p11 p2tog p1 turn work gusset decreases as follows round 1 round 2 continue turning and decreasing in needle 1 k to 3 sts before end of nee- k all sts on all needles this manner one stitch decreased knit- dle k2tog k1 wise on every rs row and purlwise on needle 2 work all sts in ribbing pat- repeat these last 2 rounds until 20 sts every ws row until all sts have been tern as established rem in total worked final rs decrease row will end needle 3 k1 ssk k to end of needle bobble all sts and sew closed as a horizon- with a ssk and final ws decrease row tal seam or use kitchener stitch to will end with a p2tog 18 sts rem on round 2 graft live sts closed heel needle 1 k all sts weave in any ends needle 2 work all sts in ribbing pat- tern as established note size may be easily adjusted by needle 3 k all sts changing needle size gauge or by repeat these last 2 rounds until there adjusting number of co sts by a mul- are 16 sts rem on needle 1 and on nee- tiple of 4 this will then change the dle 3 65 sts rem in total number of heel flap sts by a multiple of 2 and the number of gusset de- crease row by a multiple of 1 glenna c designs copyright 2010 | crazy knitting lady@gmail com | http //crazyknittinglady wordpress com pattern instructions are for personal use only not for sale garments
